definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ex 22:4 beasts, cattle, coll. (NH id., Aram. id., b9iyro0, Eth. b9r4wi: etc., Sab. [[בער]] DHM:ZMG 1876, 674; 1883, 329; Ar. ba9iyrun of camel; also ass, etc., cf. Lane:227 a; connexion with above √ obscure)—sf. [[בְּעִירׂה]] Ex 22:4, [[בְּעִירֵנוּ]] Nu 20:4, [[בְּעִירְכָם]] Ge 45:17, [[כְּ עִירָם]] Nu 20:8 + 2 t.;—beasts of burden Ge 45:17 (i.e. asses Ge 44:3, Ge 44:13); elsewhere general, cattle Ex 22:4, Nu 20:4, Nu 20:8, Nu 20:11, Ps 78:48
